attributes.action: put before the United Nations that George W. Bush should be tried for treason and war crimes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the 'questionable' consequences that lead to the rise of George W. Bush as president of the United States of America in 2000, he should be tried for treason for perverting the democratic process, and, war crimes for the 'unorthodox' and 'botched' invasion of Iraq which has resulted in over 4200 Allied deaths for which as of 13th February 2008 no concrete reason has been given for the military action taken against Iraq, however there have been several attempts at reasons, which have changed at regular intervals since the invasion was proposed in 2002.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
